name: Capsule Force
description: Battle for control of the galaxies in this frantic multiplayer action game straight out of a 1980s space anime! Blast shots, dodge energy beams, and deflect projectiles as you race your tram into the opposing team's base! Grab the capsule to capture the galaxy before your enemy captures theirs!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: 2 GHz Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: DirectX 9.0c compatible DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 140 MB available space

reviews.review_text: Well meh :/ This is pc game no console game, not many people play with friends on the couch in pc games, who have couch in front of pc anyway :D No online multiplayer, no bots, no single player campaign expect target practice missions etc. If you play on keyboard and other person on pad, pad have way more better control on targeting and player using keyboard will probably lose every time, mouse support would help but no, there is none :/ Also detecting if you want to use keyboard and other player pad or something also doesn't work, you need to go to options and to it manually, not big deal but other games can do that on the flay without any trouble. About game itself it can be fun for a moment if you have equal chances - more pad no keyboard for one player. Graphic is ok but nothing special and there is a very little content, in 15-20min you will see most of it, there are some unlocks, new layouts, skins and concept but unfortunately doesn't add much to the game
Love this game , the only thing missing is online multiplayer , you add that and some practice AI and you have a great on and offline game
